Class ReviewController

java.lang.Object
fr.iut.aluilcine.controllers.BaseController<Review,​ReviewRepository>
fr.iut.aluilcine.controllers.ReviewController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/reviews") public class ReviewController extends BaseController<Review,​ReviewRepository>
Controller permettant la gestion des reviews.
